pitch.cc: Justin Verlander is still attacking Coco Crisp with the four-seam fastball even though Crisp hit one for a home run last time up.
That was pitch number 45 for Justin Verlander; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .202 average in the first 45 pitches but they hit .233 off him after that.
